faq_about=Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) are an easy way to find answers to most of your questions. faq_searchall=Search FAQ... faq_contributeall=Contribute FAQ... faq_questiontext=question text... faq_search=Search faq_add=Add
faq_need=You need first to faq_login=log in faq_or=or faq_register=register
faq_noanswer= No answer has been provided yet for this FAQ entry. Be the first to provide one! Register on this wiki and edit this page to add an answer to this FAQ entry. faq_sheet=This class sheet must be applied on a document containing an FAQCode.FAQClass object
faq_technical=Contains technical pages for the FAQ application. faq_list=Documents in this space
